description: This file implements a React component for handling the OAuth callback from Jira, presenting user feedback on authorization status, and managing redirection based on success or failure.

methods.name: JiraOAuthCallbackPage
methods.description: Main exported component that wraps the inner OAuth callback logic within a Suspense boundary.

methods.name: JiraOAuthCallbackInner
methods.description: Inner component that handles parsing URL parameters, managing OAuth status state, user feedback, and redirection logic.
